# Bloom's Taxonomy â€” Levels & Measurable Verbs

## Remember
- define, list, name, recall, identify

## Understand
- explain, summarize, classify, illustrate, compare

## Apply
- implement, use, execute, demonstrate, solve

## Analyze
- differentiate, organize, attribute, decompose, infer

## Evaluate
- critique, justify, validate, prioritize, recommend

## Create
- design, construct, develop, compose, formulate

### Mapping to Assessment Levels
- L1: Remember/Understand checks
- L2: Apply (short tasks), Analyze (guided)
- L3: Analyze/Evaluate in realistic scenarios
- L4: Create (capstone), Evaluate with defense
